Vegan Raw Chocolate Balls

Delicious chocolate sweets! Fast and easy!

Perfect vegan sweets for Christmas, or when you are carving something chocolatey. :P

Vegan Raw Chocolate Balls

Delicious chocolate sweets!

Prep. time: 15 mins Total time: 3hrs 35 mins
approx. 35 balls
#vegan #raw #sweet #easy

Ingredients

Dry ingredients

  • 100g oatmeal
  • 2tbsp cacao for cooking
  • 1tbsp vanilla sugar
  • 60g powdered sugar

Wet ingredients

  • 100g vegan butter
  • 1 tablespoon water

For coating

  • approx. 25g shredded coconut

Instructions

  1. Soften the butter

    Let the butter soften for around 20 minutes at room temperature.

  2. Mix the dry ingredients.

    Put cacao, powdered sugar, vanilla sugar and oatmeal into a large bowl. Mix it properly.

  3. Add the wet ingredients

    Add the vegan butter and water into the bowl. And mix it by a hand, until all ingredients are evenly distributed.

  4. Create small balls and coat them with coconut

    Put baking paper onto a plate or a baking tray. Into small bowl add shredded coconut. Create small balls from the butter and coat them with coconut.

  5. Place the balls inside a fridge

    Let the balls rest inside a fridge for at least 3 hours. I usually leave them rest for a night. After this period the balls are ready for serving. Enjoy!
